first_translate: I won’t do it if you don’t like it.
second_translate: I won’t do it if you don’t want me to.
Sorry.
It's not like that.
Huh...?

first_translate: was I always this weak when it came to him?
second_translate: was I this weak when it came to him?

first_translate: I hate how I’m becoming so soft...
second_translate: I hate that I'm becoming weak-hearted...

hangle: 이러다가 시그렌을 보내줘야 할 때 못 보내주면 어떡해?
first_translate: what if I can’t let him go when it’s time for him to leave?
second_translate: What if I can't let Siegren go when the time comes?

hangle: 시그렌을 향한 마음이 커지는 게 무서워.
first_translate: I’m scared of how much I’m starting to care for him.
second_translate: I'm scared of how much my feelings for Siegren are growing.
Siegren.

hangle: 어쩌면 너하고 끝까지 가는 건 어려울지도 몰라.
first_translate: it might be hard for me to stay with you until the end.
second_translate: It might be difficult to stay with you until the end.
See you later.
Ugh, seriously.
I'm being too willful.

first_translate: I wonder if siegren is sick of me.
second_translate: I wonder if Siegren is tired of me.

hangle: 차라리 지금 질리면 나도 마음이 편할 텐데.
first_translate: it would be better for me if he was sick of me now.
second_translate: It would be easier for me if he got tired of me now.
Siegren?
this,
Lady Fiona, isn't it?
It's the Crown Prince.
Greetings, Your Highness.
It's been a while since I last saw you.
Oh... I'm sorry.
Have I had the honor of meeting Your Highness before?
We've met before!

hangle: 그건 일단 넘어가고, 아벨이 없는 지금이 대화할 기회다.
first_translate: I’ll let that go for now. this is my chance to talk to you since abel isn’t here.
second_translate: I'll let that slide for now. This is my chance to talk while Abel isn't here.
That's unfortunate.

first_translate: I even sent you a gift.
second_translate: I even sent you a gift, my lady.
A gift?

hangle: 난 황실에서 무언가를 받은 적이 없는데?
first_translate: I don’t remember receiving anything from the imperial family.
second_translate: I've never received anything from the imperial family.
Oh, wait a second.
"The client is above Heilron."

first_translate: so this crazy bastard was the client!
second_translate: So this crazy bastard was the client!

hangle: 제가… 전하께 실례를 저지른 일이라도 있던가요?
first_translate: have I... done something to offend you, your highness?
second_translate: Have I... done something to offend you, Your Highness?
Yes, you have.

first_translate: but that bastard siegren is more of a problem.
second_translate: But the bigger problem was that bastard, Siegren.
Watch how you address him.

first_translate: anyway, I wanted to surprise you with a gift,
second_translate: Anyway, I had planned it as a surprise gift.

first_translate: but it’s too bad it didn’t work out.
second_translate: It's a shame that things didn't turn out as I wanted.

hangle: 그래도 내가 영애는 아벨 공작과 달리…
second_translate: however, I see you differently from Duke Abel.
I think you're not so bad.
So as long as you stay quiet...
Oh, my apologies.

first_translate: there was a bug on your shoulder.
second_translate: There was a bug on you.
How dare you be so rude?!

first_translate: you think you’re all that because duke abel cares for you?!
second_translate: Just because Duke Abel cares for you, you think you can act all high and mighty?!

first_translate: I’m glad no one is around.
second_translate: It's a relief that no one is around.
Or...

hangle: 시그렌 녀석이 여차하면 널 지켜줄 거라 믿는 건가?
first_translate: ...do you think that bastard siegren will protect you?
second_translate: Do you think that bastard Siegren will protect you if something happens?
I can take care of myself.

hangle: 흥, 그래봤자 사생아 새끼들끼리 붙어먹은 주제에…
first_translate: hmph, you’re just a bastard who’s leeching off of him...
second_translate: Hmph, you bastards are just clinging to each other...

hangle: 아니면, 설마 아벨 공작도 그 몸으로 꼬셔낸 건가?
first_translate: or did you seduce duke abel with your body?
second_translate: Or could it be that you seduced Duke Abel using your body?

hangle: 진짜 혈육도 아닌데 아끼는 모습이 수상하다 싶더니.
first_translate: I thought it was strange how he cared for you when you’re not even blood-related.
second_translate: I did find it suspicious how he cared for you despite not being real blood relatives.
Aaah!!
Aaah, it hurts!!
Well... I understand, Your Highness.

hangle: 세상에는 입으로 말이 아닌 쓰레기를 내뱉는 자들이 있는 법이니까요.
first_translate: there are people in this world who only spew garbage instead of words.
second_translate: There are people in this world who spew garbage instead of words.

first_translate: I’ve been holding back, but this is too much!!
second_translate: I've been holding back, but this is the last straw!!
Huh? Huhhh?

first_translate: as you can see, I dodged it.
second_translate: As you can see, I dodged it.

hangle: 제 반사 신경이 그렇게 나쁜 편이 아니라서요.
second_translate: My reflexes aren't that slow.

hangle: 황족을 이렇게 건드리고 멀쩡할 것 같아?!
first_translate: do you think you’ll be fine after hitting a member of the imperial family?!
second_translate: Do you think you can get away with laying a hand on a member of the imperial family?!

first_translate: I’ll make sure you get punished--
second_translate: I'll make sure you face punishment--
Oh my, talk as much as you want.

hangle: 사람들에게 가서, 본인 입으로 직접 말하세요.
second_translate: Go and tell everyone yourself.

hangle: 전하보다 신분도 낮고 약해 보이는 영애에게 말싸움도 지고,
first_translate: tell them that you lost a verbal fight to a lady who is of lower status and weaker than you...
second_translate: Go tell everyone that you lost a verbal fight to a lady of lower status who even looks weaker than you...

first_translate: ...and that you got hit by her.
second_translate: ...and that you were beaten up one-sidedly.
Ugh...
Hey.
What are you doing right now?

first_translate: let go of me right now!
second_translate: L-Let go of me right now!
Oh no, this is bad.

first_translate: he’s going to break the crown prince’s arm if I don’t do something.
second_translate: At this rate, the crown prince’s arm might even get broken.

hangle: 이런 문제는 나중에 조용히 되갚아 줘야 한다고!
first_translate: you have to pay him back later!
second_translate: Such matters must be paid back quietly later!
Let's go now.
And, Your Highness,

hangle: 다음에는 쓰레기가 아닌 말을 내뱉으시길 바랍니다.
first_translate: I hope you speak words instead of garbage next time.
second_translate: Next time, I hope you speak words instead of garbage.
Ugh...

first_translate: maybe I provoked him too much.
second_translate: Maybe I provoked him too much.

first_translate: he’s going to be more of a pain now...
second_translate: Things are going to get more troublesome from now on...

hangle: 그 자식은 왜 자꾸 네 곁에 집적거리는 거야?
first_translate: why does that bastard keep bothering you?
second_translate: Why does that bastard keep hanging around you?
I'm wondering about that too.

first_translate: anyway, you did a good job holding back.
second_translate: Anyway, you held back well.

hangle: 저번에 이어 두 번째로 그놈의 손목을 부러뜨릴 뻔했어.
first_translate: I almost broke his wrist for the second time.
second_translate: I almost ended up breaking his wrist for the second time.

hangle: 너라면 진짜 할 것 같아서 겁나.
first_translate: I’m scared because I know you would actually do it.
second_translate: I'm scared because I feel like you really would.
...Fiona.
Hm? Why?
Are you angry?

first_translate: you ran out of the terrace earlier.
second_translate: You stormed out of the terrace before I did.

first_translate: I guess it would have looked like that to him.
second_translate: I guess it would have looked like that to you.
Well...

first_translate: I hope you’re not mad at me.
second_translate: I hope you're not angry.
Being hated by you...
How should I put this?
So...
I'm so scared.
siegren...
